name: Lies in the Ground
description:
Theme: The Game is a Liar

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to Burrow

Instructions:

**Update Post-Deadline** : I realized that I messed with the render scale and that explains the lag in the game. So I rebuild a new version. You can access it here if you're interested, the build folder contains the .exe to play the game: 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RaVEPJ1qMAYTGU5OcCvfSYqcV9IIv0iM/view?usp=shari...

Warning not optimized and may chug your pc. If the build .exe is too slow on your pc and you do not have access to stronger machine please use the project files to open Unity (version 2019.1.2) to play the game in the editor (using smaller game screen).

Build file: Lies in the Grass > Builds > Lies in the Grass.exe

Project files: Lies in the Grass > Assets > Scenes > Main.scene

*Note game name was changed near end of development.

Thank you for playing!
